name: UpdateTaskInProject
description:
Update a specific task within a project.

Use this tool to modify details of a specific task within a specified project in order to manage work assignments effectively.

parameters.name: task_uuid
parameters.description: A UUID string that uniquely identifies the specific task to be updated.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this task.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the project to access for task updates. Retrieve this using the /api/projects/ endpoint.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: task_update_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing task details to update. Includes fields like id, title, description, position, and others.
